name: Lateral Bridge (erstwhile Technology Diffusion)
description: Lateral Bridge, as the name suggests, aims to bridge the rising gap between the demand-supply of Tech Talent through Staff Augmentation Solutions. We understand that there is an abundance of qualified, stable, and affordable talent globally, but it can be difficult for organizations to find and access this talent. That's where we come in. We place a high value on the "True Ability" of the Talent we provide, and the "Time" in which we do so. We believe that this focus on quality and timeliness sets us apart and makes us a reliable choice for organizations looking to fill their tech talent needs.

enhanced_description: Lateral Bridge offers IT Staff Augmentation Solutions, acting as a global marketplace to bridge the demand-supply gap for tech talent. The service focuses on providing qualified, stable, and affordable global tech talent, emphasizing 'True Ability' and rapid delivery. It enables organizations to build or scale their tech teams quickly, typically within 7-30 days, while alleviating concerns about attrition and talent retention. Key advantages include zero scouting, subscription, or recruitment fees, access to a reserve talent pool for seamless continuity during absenteeism, and flexible 'plug and play' engagement with on-demand engineers, allowing contract termination with 60 days' notice. This approach helps organizations access top-tier global talent efficiently and flexibly, without the need for traditional payroll commitments.
